Text:
Seems like it cuts out early before the commercial breaks...

and who gives a shit if its s06e14 or s08e01

it's technically the second half of the sixth production season. i personally prefer this numbering over... whatever alternative there is.
there's also the "volumes" numbering if you prefer, but the first half of the the sixth season (last year's broadcasting) is labelled as volume 5 anyway.
